query: Which ad group has the highest conversion rate in may month?
sql:
SELECT gag.ad_group_name, 
       SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(ga.metrics_conversions), SUM(ga.metrics_interactions)) * 100 AS conversion_rate
FROM advida-data-pipeline.manager_dataset_preprod_updated.google_ads_ad_group_performance_2643649617 ga
JOIN advida-data-pipeline.manager_dataset_preprod_updated.google_ads_ad_group_details_2643649617 gag ON ga.ad_group_id = gag.ad_group_id
WHERE ga.customer_id = 3424742100
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ga.segments_date) = 5
GROUP BY gag.ad_group_name
ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
LIMIT 1
instructions_comment:
Assuming the google derrived metric formula and the associated table information is getting passed in the general instructions.. 

also instructions like micros are passed in the general instructions
